fields.name: Detonate:
fields.value:
- 1 card is taken from every remaining player, other than the one who detonated this. (When available, cards with negative effects will be chosen over cards eith positive effects.)
- Each taken card with a negative effect is then used, following the standard turn order, as if the detonated player used each card on theirself. If the card must target something other than a player, its target is randomized.
- Any taken cards with entirely positive effects are discarded with no effect on the exploded player.
- Once used, the taken cards go to the Discard Pile rather than the Play Pile.
- The <:impact:1106704414225485894> of this card will also target the detonated player, rather than the usual player. Its number will be equal to the number of cards that were taken.

fields.name: Dud:
fields.value:
- 1 card is taken from every remaining player.
- Then, each card is redistributed to the players at random.
- Each redistributed card will be revealed, but the player who recieves each card will remain secret.
_ _
If there is no detonation, the <:impact:1106704414225485894> effect will not activate.
